reviews.review: Игра хорошая. Музыка, геймплей (особенно за маньяка) и графика. Но иногда подлагивают хитбоксы, и бывают различные баги
Can't find any games after 30+ mins of waiting.

Oyun çok güzel ama katil olarak girdiğinizde oyun bulma süresi biraz uzun sürüyor. 1 katile 4 kurban gerektiği için böyle bir problem var sanırım. Bot vs. atsalar bile olur çünkü 2 el atıp çıkalım diye giriyoruz bazen oyun süresi kadar bekletiyor. Bu sefer mecbur kurban olarak oyuna giriyorsunuz. Kurban olarak girdiğinizde de sizi kancaya asıp ölene kadar başınızda kamp yapan katillerle karşılaşabiliyorsunuz. Bu iki problem dışında keyifli bir oyun olduğunu söyleyebilirim.
还行，慢慢就好了，就是玩的人没以前多了

I started playing DBD this year and there's a lot to learn when entering as a noob. It's definitely fun once you get it down but a lot of times it's really frustrating. Solo queue is alright but playing with friends is a lot more fun. I give it a 8/10 just cause I like the game so damn much.
its a great and fun game to play with friends
Holy #$%^ what a great fun game. I thought I would only like the Killer aspect of the game. But the survivor can be really fun and intense! Well done!
Отличная игра, если повезет с командой)

Let’s start this off by saying that this game has one of the biggest and most toxic communities ever made. Some people just want to see you burn and if you do good, will try to ruin your life with comments and so name calling, even stream sniping if possible. Believe me, there is many toxic things in this community.
However, I must say, this game has made so many people come together and has given me friends. In real life, I usually get no one thanks to my dorky nature. In here, I gain friends thanks to the love of the game and having the same goal: To have fun. I’m so happy with the community I have gotten and met so many great people. This game is on my top ten thanks to its community making alone. 
Let’s talk some positives, the graphics are always getting better. The chapters are always getting grander and better. The perks you get to play with are usually some of the best. I love that it’s nice to mix and match the perks. Each killer has a use and a different ability so there is a skill for each person, even for the FPS aspect. The map designs are so nice and Easter Eggs up the rear. That is how it is. Gotta love this all.
Anyways, the bad side, I have three things against this: Hitboxes. Fix them. The hit box of the Huntress Hatchets are the size of fridges, the hit box of Ghostface’s stalk to take him out of the ability is bad. But I don’t have a big problem with that.  Up next: DEATHSLINGER. His terror radius is way too small, it needs to be fixed. I am posting this as a problem because I want to have this known that I am one that agrees that his terror radius is too small. Please fix that. My third problem is Bugs. There are so many bugs. It might ruin some of the experience but it will be fixed. Trust me, not all bugs will be there. 
All around, this game is amazing. I love it, and will always play it. I’m the Cutest Neko, signing off for now!
这游戏挂也太多了吧，而且举报基本没啥用，更有些挂直接让你数据异常，直接返回主菜单，想举报都不行

Dead by Daylight.... que jogo meus amigos. Um jogo que proporciona muito "cagaço" e muitas risadas ahahahhaha. Ótimo para jogar com os amigos.
Mas não posso deixar de falar dos bugs, que estão presentes em todas as partidas.
Já no quesito "cheaters", o jogo possuí um sistema anti-cheat muito bom!
9.7/10

Both sides think the game is sided towards the other, Killers are mostly terrible and survivor players are mostly average with more salt than the dead sea. The former will tell you to git gud if you ask any trivia about the killer and the ladder is always salty even if its you playing the survivor. Its just one of those games, Still fun tho

It is A LITTLE Buggy Meyers and Ghostface have a stalk mechanic that doesnt work through cornfields for some reason most of the time.. IDK just an example.

Oh and as a mainly killer player, if you cant win without noed youre terrible. Perk singlehandedly wins you the game with zero skill effort or grace. If you win off nOed you deserve all the shittalk that comes your way.
BEST GAME OF HIDE AND SEEK EVER.
Desde el momento en que aceptas que este juego no está hecho para ser perfectamente balanceado, supongo que podrás disfrutarlo.

Um jogo muito divertido. É meio assustador no começo (ou sempre, se você for medroso como eu), mas dá pra tirar umas risadas, uns sustos...
É divertido pra jogar entre os amigos ou mesmo sozinho.
Pra liberar novos personagens demora um pouco, mas os que estão disponíveis já dá pra se divertir um pouco.
Recomendo
pog game, though I don't like how expensive custom outfits are and how long it takes to get shards to get the outfits w/o pay.

Me lo recomendaron diciendo que "es su juego favorito" y veo que no se equivocaba.. es muy entretenido y variable entre partidas, lo mas interesante es que a pesar de ser un juego online el progreso es individual, sin importar el desarrollo de la partida.
muy buen juego, tanto como de superviviente y de asesino.
谢谢你们，在我最想玩这个游戏的时候出现了同步化错误的BUG。bug修复进度在持续完成中，我的热情也在持续消灭中。
This game is trash but addictive
I am excited every time I play this game.
Eu gostei bastante do jogo, porém podia ter um voice para ajudar a cooperação no time, as vezes você cai com um pessoal que parece que gosta de comer pão de queijo.
以前一直云这款游戏，现在上手玩果然和预想的一样好玩，很棒，但就是没朋友一起
I think that maybe springtrap should be in this game
классная игра всем советую поможет развить ум в сложных ситуациях наверно

ive played 11 more hours of this game ever since my last review and Ive been emailed about my concerns about me not being able to connect to my friends lobbys or them not being able to connect to mine and It's getting very frustrating having to close the game after EVERY SINGLE GAME and its even worsewhen I have to close the entire game, let it boot up entirely till the main menu show up, to then result that I still cant play with them. very unhappy with this game at the moment.

The game looks like a fun game, but for new people trying to get into the game it's the most unfair and unforgiving game I've ever seen in my entire life

>Even being your very first time playing the game you'll be matched with 4 players at maximum level and with every single perk, some of them using all addons and offerings they can, so if you wanna play as the killer, have fun playing countless matches without being able to kill a single survivor because they have the entire arsenal of perks available in the game + hundreds of hours of experiece while you have NOTHING.

>The in-game tutorial feels extremely lacking, as a killer I had no idea what each notification meant, I had no idea how the hook and re-hooking mechanic works, I have no idea how to tell if a generator is partially repaired so I can damage it, I don't know what I should prioritize, it feels like I'm playing completely blindfolded

>There's no way to test the character, so it's pretty much impossible to know how effective or good each perk and addon is, you can't test the maps to get familiarized with them (which are all really huge), you either start the game already knowing how 100% of the game works or you'll suck badly.

>Just to begin playing for the first time you get a LOT of info dumped on you, there's just so many mechanics and things to learn, it feels like going through college.

For people who've been playing the game for a very long time the game is good, but if you're thinking abt getting into the game for the first time? Don't. Spend your money into something else. Unless you're fine with spending hours and hours (and probably days) feeling frustrated and powerless to do anything at all, this game is not for you.
Game's pretty fun w/ friends but beware of rat brain randoms
我喜歡這遊戲是因為他真的很刺激，但可惜的是在遊戲中沒辦法給予對方暗示的提示，但也提升了遊戲的刺激度

Dead by Daylight is probably one of my favorite games of all time. This game is not a hard game to run and it's fairly simple overall to play. One of the warnings I will say is that there are a decent amount of toxic players in this game but I would say if you ignore them and don't give them the attention they want, then you can easily enjoy this game. I was recommended this game last year and it has become one of my favorite games ever. This game involves knowing how to mind-game which makes it a lot different from other games and while there isn't really a competitive aspect of it, ranking up isn't too hard.  If you're someone who really enjoys horror then you're bound to love this game as it has a bunch of horror icons. I really hope others enjoy this game as much as I do :)

This game has issues, cheaters, toxicity, but it's still a good enjoyable game, QoL updates announced looks really good, gameplay is pretty fun (most of the time, but hey, that's PVP games for you)

Just wish the game was more optimised performence wise, running with a 1060 6gb and Ryzen 2600X, runs fine most of the time, but there are some annoying stutters from time to time (and it's super frustrating when it happens mid chase)
its a good and fun game
muy buen juego de survival, saben como mantener viva la fraquincia
Если и играть то только за Стива 👍🏻
Jogo muito bom, recomendo pra qm gosta de survivour horror.
